Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory1052.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Host', 3: 'With that, we conclude the opening ceremony of the Second Hydrangea Island High School Track and Field Championship.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Host', 3: 'We thank all of you for your participation, and of course...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Host', 3: 'We extend our gratitude to our host, Misono High, for their generous support and these excellent facilities.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Host', 3: "Up next is the women's 800-meter race. All participants, please proceed to the check-in area.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Female Student 1', 3: "Hey, look! It's Yata, our school's ace! She's starting her warm-up!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Female Student 2', 3: 'The Track Queen of Misono? She seems super chill. Must be pretty confident in herself, I bet.', 4: '2'}
{3: 'Student council members clear the crowd from the track, making way for the athletes.'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Among the eight colored lanes, Yata stands on Lane 4, her brows furrowed.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Female Student 1', 3: "Wait, didn't she just run here? Isn't that gonna affect her performance?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Female Student 2', 3: "She's playing mind games. She's putting pressure on the other athletes here.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Female Student 1', 3: 'You go, Yata!', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Yata stretches her shoulders on the distant track, her brows furrowed in concentration.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Yata', 3: "Just my luck... Haven't even had breakfast. Whatever, I should warm up first.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'She does a quick stretch, confirming her body is still in good form.'}
{2: 'Yata', 3: 'Fifty-fifty.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Two short whistles from the referee signal the athletes to return to their starting positions, their warm-up complete.'}
{3: 'Star athletes from different schools take their positions at the starting line, with Yata standing out among them...'}
{3: 'The side of the track is lined with Misono High cheerleaders and supporters, most of whom are junior track and field club members.'}
{3: 'Yata lifts her head and scans the crowd of supporters, searching for a certain someone among them.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Yata', 3: "Yuka's not here... But she promised the other day she'd come to cheer me on...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yata', 3: "She doesn't seem like someone who'd just stand people up, though.", 4: '1'}
{3: "Just as Yata's mind begins to wander away from the race, a sharp whistle snaps her back to reality."}
{2: 'Judge', 3: 'On your marks!'}
{3: 'The crack of the starting pistol follows, and the runners burst into motion.'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Yata leans forward, lowering her center of gravity to secure an advantageous position...'}
{3: 'The crowd comes alive with excitement as the commentator, seated under the shelter, begins their race coverage.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Host', 3: "And they're off! Taking the lead is... Yata, the Track Queen of Misono High!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Host', 3: 'What blazing speed! Is Yata planning to sprint right from the first lap?!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Host', 3: "Looks like she's built up quite a stamina reserve.", 4: '1'}
{3: "Misono's field erupts with cheers and encouragement as sweat glistens under the sun."}
{3: 'With powerful arm swings, Yata blazes through the curve and past the timing sensors...'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Host', 3: "At the 400-meter mark, Misono's Yata is way ahead of the pack!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Host', 3: 'Hold on, what kind of pace is this?!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Host', 3: "Yata's first 400 meters has already shattered the high school girls' league record!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Host', 3: 'How is this possible? This is an 800-meter race...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Host', 3: 'Hey, is the timer broken or something...', 4: '1'}
{3: 'While the announcer scrambles to verify the results with the staff, the other runners are just finishing their first 400 meters.'}
{1: 'DialogDisable'}
{1: 'RImgBg1BlowUp'}
{3: 'Yata continues forward with powerful strides, maintaining her steady rhythm and breathing.'}
{3: "She's grown accustomed to this solitary scene—no companions by her side, just herself..."}
{3: 'She races toward the distant finish line, chasing both the sunlight and the shadow of herself from yesterday.'}
{3: 'Her mind finds peace as she runs, physical discomfort and emotional burden melting away in pure concentration.'}
{3: "This is Yata's most cherished and enchanting moment—only now can she truly feel the essence of youth."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Host', 3: "There's barely any slowdown in Yata's second lap!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Host', 3: 'What kind of monster is she...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Host', 3: "Here it comes, the final stretch! Although there's no doubt who's going to win at this rate.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Host', 3: 'The winner is Yata from Misono High!', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Arms spread wide, Yata crosses the finish line, becoming the first champion of this athletic meet.'}
{3: 'The junior members of the track team swarm around Yata with water bottles in hand, their words of praise filling her ears.'}
{3: 'Amidst the celebration, she casts a lonely glance toward the starting line.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Yata', 3: "Must've been something urgent... Maybe she's sick?", 4: '1'}
